mapper.select: SELECT sum(price) as currMonthConsumeMoney, count(id) as currMonthConsumeCount, ceil(avg(price)) as currMonthConsumeAvg, max(price) as currMonthConsumeMax FROM t_consume WHERE DATE_FORMAT(createTime, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m') and user = #{id};
SELECT type, sum(price) as price FROM t_consume WHERE DATE_FORMAT(createTime, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m') and user = #{id} and type not in ('PAYMENT', 'RECHARGE','REFUND') GROUP BY type

select c.id as consumeId, c.createTime as consumeCreateTime, c.price as consumePrice, c.type as consumeType, c.info as consumeInfo, u.id as userId, u.name as userName, u.idCard as userIdCard, p.id as posId, p.name as posName, p.address as posAddress from t_consume c join t_user u on c.user = u.id join t_pos p on c.pos = p.id
c.id = #{id} and c.user=#{user}
mapper.insert: insert into t_consume(createTime, price, user, type, info) values (#{createTime}, #{price}, #{user}, #{type}, #{info})
